page.title: 18TOURIST ACCOMMODATION
page.content: This D.Block is an area of outstanding beauty,and is ideal for the visitor looking for good{walking country}and a peaceful centre for visiting places of interest.Rushbury parish has plenty of self-catering and farmhouse Bed and Breakfast facilities.Edge Farm and East Wall Farm both have a 5-van caravan site for Caravan Club members only,at approx:Â£2 per night.Farm and garden produce is sold to the visitors during the season.Edge Farm is open all year round and has toilet,hot water and shower facilities.Coates Farm can accommodate members of the Camping Club as well as caravanners. East Wall Farm have B.& B.facilities at approx:Â£7 per night.Stanway Manor lets both a flat and a cottage for self-catering holidays.Upper Stanway Farm also lets a cottage for visitors.
